General.Name: Tera Autotech
General.Description: Tera Autotech Corporation researches, develops, design, manufactures, and sells industrial automation equipment in Taiwan, China, and internationally. The company offers automatic storage and logistic equipment, such as cleanroom, normal environment, semiconductor, and peripheral equipment; whole plant automated logistic equipment for LCD, solar, 3C, and PCB drill industry; automatic re-grind machines, product inspection machines, RGV machines, and lock screw machines; CNC machines, welding equipment, and chamber processing machines; and measurement equipment, including CMM, laser trackers, and laser interferon meters. It also offers drill products, including standard, micro, large, UC, and slot drills, as well as router bits. The company was formerly known as Gauss Automation Corporation and changed its name to Tera Autotech Corporation in 1990. Tera Autotech Corporation was founded in 1979 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
